CIserver

Class HtmlGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • CIserver.HtmlGenerator

  • public class HtmlGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for creating a HTML document for the web interface so that you can traverse the log file system and display the contents of the log files.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • readFile

        public static java.lang.String readFile(java.io.File file,
                                        boolean isLog)
        Returns the contents of a file in a string.
        Parameters:
        file - - A file.
        isLog - specifies whether the given file is a log file and needs added linebreak.
        Returns:
        a string that contains the contents of the file, or if there is a FileNotFoundException, NullPointerException or another exception, return null.

      • get

        public static java.lang.String get(java.lang.String path)
        Used for reading log files and creating the HTML that is to be rendered on the web interface. If the current path is a directory, output all of the links to all the subdirectories and files, as well as a link for getting back to the previous directory. If the current path is a file, output its contents.
        Parameters:
        path - - the (relative) path of the current directory.
        Returns:
        a string containing an HTML document that is to be put on the web interface, or if there were any errors null is returned.
